name: Ninja Vs Monsters
description:
Ninja Vs Monsters is fun and challenging action game.

A shooter game, with point to shoot mechanism. There is also dodge controls for which are visible on the screen but player can also use A and D on the keyboard.
Since it was initially made and planned to be touch device game, it's controls are touch based.

In order to use a skill or change weapon, player should do left click and hold on the either weapon, or skill to see the options available for action.

Each game is new start, you can play choose which weapon you want to try and beat the game with. In the armory, using the coins earned from the kills, player can buy usable items, skills or upgrade weapons.
The more coin you earn as you play you can gain more power.

How to increase coins income:

  • kill monsters sooner, their price drop the longer they live
  • have accuracy higher than 50% on each wave (that will reward star on the end of the wave)
  • try not to take any damage thorough out the wave, it will give you start at the end of the wave
  • kill as much monsters as you can with 1 grenade, the bonus coins are tremendous
  • be economic, cut your spending and have as much coins as possible on the wave reward screen, they reward coins is based on your current balance

2 bosses

  • Evil Dragon - With it's defensive sphere is tough to beat, you'd have to be patient, dodge some attacks and wait for the right time
  • Cursed Pumpkin - Fast and furious plant, wide palette of attacks, all hard to defend from, to beat this one you have to be fast and accurate

Challenge modes

There are several challenges with different nature. One of those are:

  • Stop the stampede - Get all the hippos, don't let single hippo get away
  • Pumpkin Reflex - Dodge and survive 100 pumpkin bombs in 1 minute
  • Granadeem Octos - Kill 100 Octos with only 10 grenades
  • ....

Armory

Player can go to armory by clicking on the star icon in the left-top corner on the screen, in armory player can spend the coins and buy upgrades, skill or items

Controls

  • Shoot - Click/Tap on the screen where to shoot with the current weapon.
  • Change Weapon - Click/Tap and hold on the weapon icon in the right-bottom corner, once new weapons appear as option, move the cursor to the desired one and let the tap/click off
  • Use Skill - Click/Tap on skill icon in the left-bottom side, one the skills appear, move the pointer to the desired skill and let go
  • Use Backpack item - Same mechanism as the ones above, just use the backpack icon above the weapon icon, in the right-bottom corner
  • Move Sideways - Click/Tap and hold left or right arrow on the left/right sides of the screen, also A/D keys on keyboard can be used
  • Blink - A quick dodge move is possible once player purchases blink as skill, to perform it player should just do quick press on the move buttons or the keyboard A/D,

Skills

Armageddon - Ninja sends powerful fireball in the heaven, which causes dozens of meteors to strike back randomly on the field in front of him, causing great damage to the enemies

Power Blast - Ninja gathers his strength to do power ground hit making the ground shake and causing all enemies to be disabled and stunned in fear for several seconds, which come  in handy in crowdy moments

Blink - Quick dodge move, great to avoid fatal blows

Defense Sphere - A defensive sphere spawns around ninja, reflecting all attacks or enemies that try to come to our ninja, a nice several seconds that can be used to turn the tides

Skills take mana to be performed, which regenerates automatically, or player can recover it quickly by using mana potion.
